comprehensive_overview: FFTW (Fastest Fourier Transform in the West) is a highly optimized library for computing the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) efficiently. It provides a set of fast Fourier transform algorithms for both real and complex data, offering high performance and accuracy across various platforms.
core_features: Optimized library for Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT)
Supports real and complex data computations
